name: Hentai Tales: Licentious Town Azaria
description:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

There is a small town in a country called Azaria. In this town, you can legally have sex with anyone anywhere. Everyone has an obligation to have sex with the person they ask for, whether they like the person or not.
You are full of sexual desire and plans to enjoy this opportunity and have sex with every woman you meet.
What will be here?

Characters

Mari:

Mari is the first beautiful girl you meet in the town Azaria.
She flirted with you teasingly when you first arrived in town.

Kamani:

When you arrive at the room booked, Kamani appears in your room.
Here you will use your body to pay the rent.

Koko:

KoKo is a stern boss who scolds her subordinates every day.
But beneath the stern exterior lies a lustful heart.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)
